name: Camo
text: When an opponent targets this model with a ranged attack, and this model is obscured, the hit roll suffers an additional -1 modifier.

name: Grunt
text: This model automatically fails all Nerve tests taken when its wounds are reduced below 0. It is always removed from play.

name: Inspire
text: This model and all friendly models within 6" may re-roll failed Nerve tests.

name: Iron Halo
text: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save

name: And They Shall Know No Fear
text: You can re-roll failed Nerve tests for this model

name: Med Kit
text: Single use item. A model with this item may discard it during its activation to recover 1 wound.

name: Rites Of Battle
text: For the rest of the turn, you can re-roll melee and shooting hit-rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6‚Äù of this model.

name: Stim Pack
text: Single use item. A fatigued model with this item may discard it during the End Phase to become un-fatigued.

name: Vox-Caster
text: Use when a friendly model is about to make a Nerve test. The model receives a +1 modifier to the Nerve test.
